column4: When I open the synaptic package manager I get the fallowing error W: Couldn't stat source package list http://cv.archive.ubuntu.com breezy/universe Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/cv.archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_breezy_universe_binary-i386_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)  What does this mean and how can I fix it?
you need to update your sources list
how do I do that.  I am new to ubuntu and am trying to learn so please be patient.
_jason, you need to put sudo before that command. jason he's a new user
